subject: Vam Pro Motor Iracing setup
description_text:
Hello

I just rectified my VAM Pro Haptic Motors.  I mounted them and set them up
in the Simsonn software. but i can't work out how i make the ABS function
work in Iracning. I just don't get feedback.

how do i set them up?

Kind Regards

Gian

conversations.body_text: Hi Gian Guggi,  The iRacing telemetry interface does not natively provide ABS or TC (traction control) flags. However, you can use SIMHUB version 9.9.3, which already supports our pedals and can calculate and infer these telemetry flags through its internal logic. We will also include support for these indicators in our upcoming version 2.0.9 release.

Hi Thank you.

I figured that out yesterday. They work great now. I wast just not sure if
you can do that directly over your own software.

Thx for the help

On Sat, 12 Jul 2025 at 08:45, support@simsonn.com

Hi Gian Guggi,    Version 2.0.9 is scheduled to be released next Monday or Tuesday. Development is complete, and it’s currently in the testing phase. The new version will include support for the relevant features.
